step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance.
Excellent! Now, focus on stretching your palm and fingers wide open.
Great job making a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Keep it up!
Perfect! Open your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Visualize the fluid moving.
Second rep starting strong! Remember to keep that arm extended overhead.
Well done opening your hand wide. Maintain that stretch.
You're making a good fist and tightening your muscles. Keep breathing deeply.
Fantastic finish! Relaxing your hand and exhaling completes the pump. Great work!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and focus on opening your hand wide, then making a fist while inhaling. Exhale as you relax your hand. Keep up the good work!
